text: The AVN Award for Male Foreign Performer of the Year is an award that has been given annually by sex industry company AVN since the award's creation in 2003. The first person awarded was Italian-born pornographic actor Rocco Siffredi who was awarded at 20th AVN Awards in 2003, Rocco Siffredi is the most honoured actor with ten awards. ==Winners and nominees== ===2000s=== Year Photo Winner Nationality Nominees 2003 Rocco Siffredi Italian * Christoph Clark * Steve Holmes * Alberto Rey * Toni Ribas * Nacho Vidal 2004 Manuel Ferrara French * Frank
